<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1118046_partne_0_requests</collection><condition>current.comments.changes()</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Sync Request Comment to Tasks</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

// THE LOOP BREAKER: Check for the session flag. If it exists, stop immediately.
    if (gs.getSession().getClientData('isSyncingComments') == 'true') {
        return;
    }

    // SET THE FLAG: Announce the start of a sync operation.
    gs.getSession().putClientData('isSyncingComments', 'true');

    var grTask = new GlideRecord('x_1118046_partne_0_tasks');
    grTask.addQuery('partner_onboarding_request', current.getUniqueValue());
    grTask.addActiveQuery();
    grTask.query();

    while (grTask.next()) {
        new x_1118046_partne_0.CommentSyncUtil().syncComments(current, grTask);
    }

    // UNSET THE FLAG: Announce the end of the sync operation.
    gs.getSession().putClientData('isSyncingComments', null);

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-08-09 16:04:21</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>21bc60c993db2650d5ec31697bba1086</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Sync Request Comment to Tasks</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Partner Onboarding" source="x_1118046_partne_0">2ac1af2e931ea290d5ec31697bba10f0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Partner Onboarding">2ac1af2e931ea290d5ec31697bba10f0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_21bc60c993db2650d5ec31697bba1086</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-08-09 16:12:32</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=21bc60c993db2650d5ec31697bba1086"/></record_update>
